title: Once In Awhile Side Pieces
itunes:title: Once In Awhile Side Pieces
description:
Today on the show we opened the phone lines to see if any of our listeners would grant their partners a side piece once a month, after a video surfaced of Michael Blackson fiance explaining her reasoning why she allows it. Also, Charlamagne to the mother of the thug who decided to take several innocent lives this past weekend at a Gorcery Store. Also, we had labor organizer Chris Smalls stop by to speak about unionizing against Amazon, protesting unfair working conditions and more.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
